Entries.default: "We're gonna bury this place on the way out, yeah?"
"Death be too kind for these thrice-damned bastards, cap."
"This place has a mighty strong need for a reaping, Watcher."
"They don't even keep their scalpels sharp. As if that would be any mercy..."
"Let's not hang around here any longer than we have to."
"These experiments seem the random fumbling of a child. Or an Aedyran."
"A sanctum to some, a slaughterhouse to others."
"Let none doubt Rymrgand the very hand of mercy."
